==Japanese==

===Etymology 1===
<div style="float:right;">
{{wikipedia|lang=ja|モロコシ|唐黍}}
{{wikipedia|Sorghum bicolor}}
[[File:Sorghum.jpg|thumb|250px|{{lang|ja|唐黍}} (''morokoshi kibi'', ''morokoshi'', ''tōkibi''): '''[[sorghum]]'''.]]
</div>
{{ja-kanjitab|yomi=k|もろこし|きび}}
Compound of {{compound|lang=ja|sort=もろこしきび|唐|tr1=morokoshi|t1=China in general; {{qualifier|by extension}} foreign|黍|tr2=kibi|t2=millet}}.

====Pronunciation====
{{ja-pron|yomi=irr|もろこし きび|acc=5}}

====Alternative forms====
* {{ja-l|蜀黍}}

===Noun===
{{ja-noun|もろこし きび}}

# [[sorghum]]

=====Usage notes=====
The longer term ''morokoshi kibi'' has been largely replaced by the shorter form ''morokoshi'' below.

=====Synonyms=====
* {{ja-r|蜀黍|もろこし}}, {{ja-r|唐黍|もろこし}}
* {{ja-r|唐黍|とうきび}}
* {{ja-r|高黍|たかきび}}

===Etymology 2===
<div style="float:right;">
{{wikipedia|lang=ja|トウモロコシ|唐黍}}
{{wikipedia|Sorghum bicolor}}
[[File:Maispflanze.jpg|thumb|250px|{{lang|ja|唐黍}} (''morokoshi'', ''tōkibi''): '''[[maize]]'''.]]
</div>
{{ja-kanjitab|yomi=irr|sort=もろこし}}
Abbreviation of ''morokoshi kibi'' above, with the abbreviated reading then re-applied to the entire kanji compound.<ref name="KDJ">{{R:Kokugo Dai Jiten}}</ref>

====Pronunciation====
{{ja-pron|yomi=irr|もろこし|acc=0|acc_ref=DJR}}

====Alternative forms====
* {{ja-l|蜀黍}}

====Noun====
{{ja-noun|もろこし}}

# [[sorghum]]
# [[maize]], [[corn]] {{qualifier|especially [[corn on the cob]]}}

=====Synonyms=====
* {{sense|sorghum}} {{ja-r|蜀黍|もろこし}}, {{ja-r|唐黍|もろこし}}, {{ja-r|唐黍|とうきび}}, {{ja-r|高黍|たかきび}}
* {{sense|maize}} {{ja-r|玉蜀黍|とうもろこし}}, {{ja-r|唐黍|とうきび}}

=====Usage notes=====
The term {{m|ja|玉蜀黍|tr=tōmorokoshi}} is more common for the {{m|en|maize}} sense.

===Etymology 3===
{{ja-kanjitab|yomi=j|とう|きび}}
{{IPAchar|/taukibi/}} → {{IPAchar|/tɔːkibi/}} → {{IPAchar|/toːkibi/}}

Compound of {{compound|lang=ja|sort=とうきび|唐|tr1=tō|t1=Tang Dynasty; China in general; {{qualifier|by extension}} foreign|黍|tr2=kibi|t2=millet}}.<ref name="KDJ">{{R:Kokugo Dai Jiten}}</ref><ref name="DJR">{{R:Daijirin}}</ref>

====Pronunciation====
{{ja-pron|yomi=j|とうきび|acc=3|acc_ref=DJR}}

====Noun====
{{ja-noun|とうきび}}

# [[maize]], [[corn]] {{qualifier|especially [[corn on the cob]]}}
# [[sorghum]]

=====Synonyms=====
* {{sense|maize}} {{ja-r|玉蜀黍|とうもろこし}}
* {{sense|sorghum}} {{ja-r|蜀黍|もろこし}}, {{ja-r|唐黍|もろこし}}, {{ja-r|高黍|たかきび}}
